markdownRemark.html: The world is open book. When you don't know the answer to something in real life, you're supposed to find someone who does and ask them. How to translate this to grading? What if kids were graded on how many of their peers' questions they could answer? Set the bar so that kids who ask for help on every question have the minimum passing grade and kids who answer every question get the maximum grade. Encourage collaboration while still measuring knowledge.
